type:
∀ {X : Type} {f : X → Real} {g : Nat → X},
  Function.Bijective g →
    { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (Function.comp f g n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.absConverges →
      Chapter8.AbsConvergent f

AbsConvergent
mk

type:
∀ {a : Nat → Real},
  { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.converges →
    Not { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.absConverges →
      Exists fun f =>
        And (Function.Bijective f)
          (Filter.Tendsto
            (fun N =>
              ({ m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (Function.comp a f n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.partial
                  N).toEReal)
            Filter.atTop (nhds EReal.instTop.top))

type:
∀ {X : Type} {f : X → Real} {A : Set X}
  (h :
    Exists fun g =>
      And (Function.Bijective g)
        (Exists fun L =>
          Filter.Tendsto
            (fun N =>
              (Finset.Icc 0 N).sum fun n =>
                if h : Int.instLEInt.le 0 n then abs (ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (f (g n.toNat).val) 0) else 0)
            Filter.atTop (nhds L))),
  (Exists fun L =>
      Filter.Tendsto
        (fun N => (Finset.Icc 0 N).sum fun n => ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (f (Classical.choose h n.toNat).val) 0)
        Filter.atTop (nhds L)) →
    Exists fun x =>
      Filter.Tendsto
        (fun N =>
          (Finset.Icc 0 N).sum fun x =>
            ite (Int.instLEInt.le (instHMul.hMul (-1) x) 0) (f (Classical.choose ⋯ x.toNat).val) 0)
        Filter.atTop (nhds x)
name: Chapter8
Sum'
of_countable_supp
_proof_1_12

type:
∀ {f : Prod Nat Nat → Real} (w : Nat → Prod Nat Nat),
  Function.Bijective w →
    ∀ (w_1 : Real),
      Filter.Tendsto
          (fun N =>
            (Finset.Icc 0 N).sum fun x =>
              ite (Int.instLEInt.le (instHMul.hMul (-1) x) 0)
                (abs (ite (Int.instLEInt.le (instHMul.hMul (-1) x) 0) (f (w x.toNat)) 0)) 0)
          Filter.atTop (nhds w_1) →
        Exists fun a =>
          And (Function.Bijective a)
            (Exists fun L =>
              Filter.Tendsto
                (fun N =>
                  (Finset.Icc
                        { m := { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (f (a n.toNat)) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.m,
                            seq := fun n =>
                              if h :
                                  Int.instLEInt.le
                                    { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (f (a n.toNat)) 0,
                                        vanish := ⋯ }.m
                                    n then
                                abs
                                  ({ m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (f (a n.toNat)) 0,
                                        vanish := ⋯ }.seq
                                    ⟨n, h⟩.val)
                              else 0,
                            vanish := ⋯ }.m
                        N).sum
                    fun n =>
                    { m := { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (f (a n.toNat)) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.m,
                          seq := fun n =>
                            if h :
                                Int.instLEInt.le
                                  { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (f (a n.toNat)) 0,
                                      vanish := ⋯ }.m
                                  n then
                              abs
                                ({ m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (f (a n.toNat)) 0,
                                      vanish := ⋯ }.seq
                                  ⟨n, h⟩.val)
                            else 0,
                          vanish := ⋯ }.seq
                      n)
                Filter.atTop (nhds L))
